title: YEAR OF THE JUNGLE
quote: Important and necessary. Eases the pain of separation and deployment for families with young children.

title: WHEN CHARLIE MCBUTTON LOST POWER
quote: A clever, humorous story in rhyme. This would be an excellent read-aloud choice for units on electricity or weather.

title: MOCKINGJAY
quote: Suzanne Collins has done it again with 'Mockingjay'. It's every bit as original and thought provoking, as The Hunger Games. Wow.

title: CATCHING FIRE
quote: In the second installment of the Hunger Games series, Collins maintains the tension, leaving readers in constant suspense. The book doesn’t disappoint when it segues into the pulse-pounding action readers have come to expect.

title: THE HUNGER GAMES
quote: Collins has joined J.K. Rowling and Stephenie Meyer as a writer of children's books that adults are eager to read.

title: GREGOR THE OVERLANDER
quote: Collins introduces new characters and plot twists without ever losing sight of the big story’s emotional stakes. This gripping fantasy easily transitions into a series that readers will eagerly devour, and the cliffhanger ending will have them clamoring for the next installment.

title: GREGOR AND THE PROPHECY OF BANE
quote: The engrossing plot and hair-raising adventures continue to thrill.

title: GREGOR AND THE CURSE OF THE WARMBLOODS
quote: The brisk pace, excellent world-building, and compelling characters make this a satisfying page-turner.

title: GREGOR AND THE MARKS OF SECRET
quote: The pacing remains fast and the world-building rich.

title: GREGOR AND THE CODE OF CLAW
quote: The final book in the series continues the action-packed, original adventures.
